SEARCH
Package com.dao

Class PolicyDao

java.lang.Object
com.dao.PolicyDao
public class PolicyDao extends Object
The PolicyDao class provides methods for managing policies and vehicles in the database. This class interacts with the database using JDBC to perform CRUD operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PolicyDao()
    Constructor to initialize the database connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • PolicyDao

      public PolicyDao()
      Constructor to initialize the database connection.

  • Method Details

    • createPolicy

      public int createPolicy(Policy policy, int underwriterId)
      Creates a new policy record in the database.
      Parameters:
      policy - the Policy object containing the policy details.
      underwriterId - the ID of the underwriter associated with the policy.
      Returns:
      the generated policy ID, or -1 if the creation failed.

    • getPolicyById

      public Policy getPolicyById(int policyId)
      Retrieves a policy from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      policyId - the ID of the policy to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Policy object, or null if no policy was found.

    • getAllPolicies

      public List<Policy> getAllPolicies()
      Retrieves all policies from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all Policy objects.

    • renewPolicy

      public Policy renewPolicy(int policyId, int underwriterId)
      Renews an existing policy by creating a new policy record with updated details.
      Parameters:
      policyId - the ID of the policy to renew.
      underwriterId - the ID of the underwriter associated with the policy.
      Returns:
      the updated Policy object, or null if the renewal failed.

    • updatePolicyType

      public Policy updatePolicyType(int policyId, int underwriterId)
      Updates the insurance type of a policy to "Full Insurance" and adjusts the premium amount.
      Parameters:
      policyId - the ID of the policy to update.
      underwriterId - the ID of the underwriter associated with the policy.
      Returns:
      the updated Policy object, or null if the update failed.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the policy is already "Full Insurance".
      IllegalArgumentException - if no policy is found with the given ID and underwriter.

    • viewPolicy

      public Policy viewPolicy(int policyId)
      View a Policy object for a policyID.
      Parameters:
      policyId - the policy ID for which the details is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      the extracted Policy object.
